page.title: 03THORPE AUDLIN
page.content: THORPE AUDLIN Landscape And Description Thorpe Audlin is a small,peaceful village which dates back to medieval times.Although it is an old village there are many young people living there. There are only a few amenities in the village. There is a post office which acts as a general store;a public house;and one restaurant at Rogerthorpe Manor.There is a sports field which is used for the playing of football and cricket and an adequate bus service.The nearest place of worship to Thorpe Audlin is in Badsworth. Although people have to travel to most amenities they still find Thorpe Audlin a pleasant place to live in. H.Buckman D.Jagger M.Goulding All aged 13
